page.title: Your Personal Insights
page.subtitle: Discover patterns and build healthy habits

noInsights.title: Log at least 1 meal and 1 reading to unlock insights.
noInsights.description: As you log more, we'll spot simple patterns and suggestions.

page.error: Unable to load insights. Please try again.

post_meal_rise.title: Post-meal rise noticed
post_meal_rise.body: Your wellness reading rose +{delta} points after {mealName}. Meals around {carbs}g carbs tend to lead to bigger rises. Consider smaller portions or adding fiber.

carb_budget_trend.title: Carb budget trend
carb_budget_trend.body: You averaged {avgCarbs}g vs a goal of {dailyGoal}g over 3 days. Want to try lower-carb swaps or higher-fiber picks?

evening_pattern.title: Evening pattern
evening_pattern.body: Your largest rises often follow dinner. A short post-dinner walk or a higher-fiber side may help.

disclaimer.title: Wellness Note:
disclaimer.text: These insights support your personal tracking and habit-building. Always consult a healthcare professional for medical guidance.

suggestions.title: Smart picks for now
suggestions.subtitle: Based on your remaining carb budget ({carbsRemaining}g)
suggestions.exploreLibrary: Explore our recipe library to find meals that fit your carb budget

encouragement.hasInsights: üéâ Great job tracking your wellness journey! Your insights update automatically as you log more data.
encouragement.noInsights: üå± Start logging meals and wellness readings to generate personalized insights about your wellness patterns.

welcome.title: Welcome to GlycoGuide
welcome.subtitle: Let's personalize your wellness journey
welcome.description: In just 3 minutes, we'll help you set up your goals, preferences, and reminders for a more effective experience.

goals.title: Set Your Daily Goals
goals.subtitle: These help us provide better recommendations

preferences.title: Food Preferences
preferences.subtitle: Help us recommend meals you'll love

reminders.title: Daily Reminders
reminders.subtitle: Set gentle reminders for healthy habits

completed.title: You're All Set!
completed.subtitle: Welcome to your personalized wellness journey
completed.description: Your dashboard is ready with personalized recommendations based on your goals and preferences.

reflection.title: Evening Reflection
reflection.subtitle: Take a moment to reflect on your day

gratitude.label: What are you grateful for today?

notes.label: Any other thoughts?
notes.placeholder: How did your wellness habits feel today?

exports.title: Export Your Data
exports.subtitle: Download your wellness data for personal records

upgradeModal.title: Premium Feature
upgradeModal.description: Data exports are available for Premium and Pro subscribers

errors.noData: No data available for selected date range
errors.tooLarge: Date range too large. Please select a smaller range.

upgrade.title: Upgrade Your Plan
upgrade.subtitle: Unlock more features for better wellness tracking

settings.title: Settings
settings.analytics_desc: Helps improve the app. You can turn this off anytime.
settings.delete_desc: This will remove your data. This can't be undone.
settings.disclaimer: GlycoGuide is a wellness and self-tracking app. It does not diagnose, treat, or provide medical advice.

errors.fallback_body: Please try again in a moment.
errors.offline: You're offline. Changes will sync when you're back.

landing.hero_sub: Log meals in two taps, spot simple patterns, and feel better day by day.
landing.bullet2: Smart picks tailored to your day

premium.title: Premium Plan
